item.title: Make Files!
item.description: Make Files What are makefiles? you worker who will do tha job for you and for free even :P, same goes for CI, CD pipeline while working, corercting completing my freshman year project of c based text editor, I realized I should Upgrade my coding style to incorporate makefiles to be a efficient coder. So, before all the intricate details, on how to use makefiles, syntax and all. Let’s start with what it is first and why you should even care about it.
